# friends

**Instance Property**

The player identifiers for the local player’s friends.

## Declaration

```swift
var friends: [String]? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is invalid until a call to [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLocalPlayer/loadFriendsObsoleted(completionHandler:)] succeeds.
title: friends
